text: The Main Source were a Canadian and American hip hop and rap group from 1989 to 1994. Their single "What You Need" was sampled by singer Madonna on her bondage inspired song "Human Nature" during 1994-1995. The rap group were based in New York City and Toronto in Canada. title: Main Source
